title: Borrowing Your Enemy's Arrows
medium: Wood boat, canvas sail, arrows, metal, rope, Chinese flag, and electric fan
dimensions: Boat approximately 60" x 23' 7" x 7' 6" (152.4 x 720 x 230 cm), each arrow approximately 24" (62 cm)
credits: Gift of Patricia Phelps de Cisneros in honor of Glenn D. Lowry
